it.unive.dais.legodroid.lib.comm

Class Packet

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.unive.dais.legodroid.lib.comm.Packet
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Command, Reply

    public abstract class Packet
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class that serves as a superclass for Command and Reply.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected int counter
      The sequence number: always increasing and uniquely identifying the packet.
      protected byte[] data
      The data attached to the packet as a byte array.

    • Constructor Summary

      Create a packet given a counter and a byte array of data.
